title: Lionel Messi believed Neymar was heading to the Bernabeu if Barcelona failed to sign him
text:
Lionel Messi thought Neymar was heading to Real Madrid if Barcelona didn't sign him.

The Paris Saint-Germain star was desperate to leave the Ligue 1 champions in the summer but ended up staying put.

The Argentine star was hoping he would re-join Barcelona but wouldn't have been surprised if he had moved to his arch enemies.

The Paris Saint-Germain star was desperate to leave the Ligue 1 champions in the summer

'I really thought Neymar would go to Real Madrid if he didn't come here,' Messi said in an interview with RAC1, the full version of which will be broadcast on Wednesday.

'He really wanted to leave Paris and he'd shown it.

'And I thought that Florentino [Perez] and Real Madrid were going to do something to sign him.'

Barcelona could reportedly use Antoine Griezmann as a makeweight in a potential move for former star Neymar amid concerns that the Frenchman's relationship with Messi is strained.

The £108million summer signing previously admitted that he has rarely spoken with the mercurial Argentine since his arrival, and has also endured a mixed start to life at his new club.

French outlet Le10sport claims that because the pair haven't yet bonded, Barcelona could once again turn their attentions to sealing an ambitious reunion with Paris Saint-Germain forward Neymar.
description: Lionel Messi thought Neymar was heading to Real Madrid if Barcelona didn't sign him. The Paris Saint-Germain star was desperate to leave the Ligue 1 champions in the summer.
